text: Sharon Stewart-Peregoy (born June 3, 1953) is a Democratic member of the Montana House of Representatives. She was elected to Senate District 21, representing Crow Agency, Montana. She received a BS from Montana State University and a master's degree in education from City University at Seattle. She is an "advocate for the revitalization of the Crow language and culture on the Crow Reservation."
